  • Post your 'Now Playing' songs to Twitter!

    We can automatically post all your Radio Stations songs to your Twitter feed. Include images, tag the artist and much more.

    Find out more...

  • Alexa Skills for Radio

    Stream YOUR Radio Station to millions of Alexa-enabled devices with our Custom Alexa Radio Skills!

    Find out more...

  • Post your 'Now Playing songs to TuneIn!

    We can post all of your Radio Stations songs to TuneIn so they appear in the TuneIn directory and searches, get more listeners!

    Find out more...

  • Now Playing / Recently Played Widgets

    Fully configurable, SSL enabled Now Playing and Recently Played Widgets for your website.

    Find out more...

Twitter

Automatically post your Radio Stations songs, RSS feeds, scheduled posts and images and much more to your Twitter feed…

Read More →

Alexa

Make your Radio Station available to millions of listeners via Amazon Alexa-enabled devices with our Alexa Radio Skills…

Read More →

TuneIn

Automatically post all your Radio Stations songs to the TuneIn radio directory and have them appear in listener searches…

Read More →

Facebook Player

Add a Tab to your Facebook Page and stream LIVE radio to your listeners and followers via your Radio Stations Facebook page.

Read More →

Widgets

Get customized Now Playing & Recently Played widgets to embed into your website and offer your visitors a great user experience.

Read More →

We’re autopo.st and we offer services to the Media industry.
From our Twitter, Facebook and TuneIn auto post services to our Mobile Apps and Alexa Radio Skill services we can enhance your Radio or TV station and take it to the next level!

We also have many more services such as Widgets, Streaming server monitoring, Website monitoring, Silence Detection and Song Detection services.

We also offer our Facebook Radio Player Plugin so you can stream your Radio Station LIVE from your Facebook page, our range of Mobile Phone Apps for iOS, Android and Amazon. Broadcast to millions of listeners on the Alexa platform with our Alexa Radio Skill service and we also build apps for the Fire TV and Roku TV platforms. Use our Cloud Audio Logging to store your stations output in the cloud.

Welcome to autopo.st

Hello, we're autopo.st!

We post your Radio and/or TV Stations songs (and other stuff too) to your Social Media networks.

We can post your songs to Twitter, Facebook and Tunein. Let your followers know what you are playing. We do much more, we can also post an image of the artist with each post!

Power boost your social media platforms and offer your followers a great user experience.

We also offer other services! Get our Server Down Detection service, compatible with Shoutcast and Icecast and always know the status of your server. Get alerted immediately if it ever goes down.

Another must is our customizable HTML Now Playing / Recently Played song widgets, show your listeners what is playing and what's been played with Social Media and Amazon/iTunes integration.

We now also offer Mobile Phone apps for Radio Stations (iOS, Android and Amazon.

Ready to broadcast your station to millions of homes? Check out our Alexa Radio Skill service.

Want to turn your radio station into a TV channel and broadcast on the Fire TV, Roku TV and Twitter Live platforms? We can build apps for your Radio and TV stations. Need to log your Radio Stations output? Check out of Cloud Audio Logging service.

Take a look around our site and do not hesitate to get in touch with any questions.

Our Tweets

Tweets by @PostNowPlaying

Like Us!

Our Reviews

  •   This is the best marketing tool to promote your web radio station. Our listeners love it. It's an awesome service.

    Randy Parker
    2/04/2018

  •   Been using the service for over two years now and compared to other services I have tried, these guys rock. Support when things go a little out of wack is second to none! Gavin has been there every time we needed help mainly when Facebook or Twitter change something! If your running a station and don't have this services your as mad as the hatter himself! We use the schedule posting feature to advertise our up and coming shows in advance which has been a great driver for inc... reasing our listener numbers. Well done lads, finally a service that does what it says on tin! See more

    Irish Net
    8/23/2017

  •   I have worked with this company for years. They have never given me any kind of bad service. They have always helped me in moving toward my company goals. If there was a rating higher than excellent they would get it from me. I have been blessed to have known about autopo as they have helped me to give my clients excellent service and helped my business grow in a major way.

    Linton J. Smith Jr
    2/20/2018

  •   Great Service for our station. Constantly being developed with new features. Great Customer Service Team. Great looking client area. Looking forward to the New Facebook Feature.

    Mickey Gocool
    10/20/2017

Contact Us

Do you have questions about our services?

Just get in touch with us and we'll be happy to answer all your queries about our services

Email : info@autopo.st
Contact Form : autopo.st/contact-us
Facebook : facebook.com/autopostmedia
Twitter : @autopostmedia

Latest News

  • Extract song metadata from prerecorded shows
  • Fire TV App development service added
  • Twitter Live Streaming via Periscope
  • Alexa enabled devices reaches 20,000
  • Change to Mobile App service – Apple Developer Account
